mapper.insert: insert into FUND_UNIT_CUSTOMER_CONSTRAINT (SERIALNO, CUSTOMERID, REMAINSUM, FUNDUNITNO, INPUTDATE, UPDATEUSERID, UPDATEDATE, INPUTUSERID, INPUTORGID, UPDATEORGID) values (#{serialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remainSum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fundUnitNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inputDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inputUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inputOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.select: select SERIALNO, CUSTOMERID, REMAINSUM, FUNDUNITNO, INPUTDATE, UPDATEUSERID, UPDATEDATE, INPUTUSERID, INPUTORGID, UPDATEORGID from FUND_UNIT_CUSTOMER_CONSTRAINT where SERIALNO = #{serialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
